description.raw:
I noticed that sdformat had a broken pragma when suppressing deprecation warnings (push instead of pop). Fixing that pragma ([sdformat pull request 196](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-request/196/fix-pragma-from-pull-request-173-push/diff)) causes a [bunch of gazebo warnings](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-sdformat-any-devel-trusty-amd64/13/warnings17Result/new/) in the following files:

* examples/plugins/model_move/model_move.cc
* gazebo/physics/PhysicsEngine.cc
* gazebo/physics/PresetManager.cc

This branch [fixes those warnings](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-sdformat-any-devel-trusty-amd64/15/).

Also, I noticed that some of the warnings were related to problems parsing Vector3 variables from sdf world files (#1631), so I fixed that as well. It involves handling `ignition::math::Vector3d` types in PresetManager and `PhysicsEngine::SetParam`. To be sure that it's working, I added tests for setting gravity and magnitic_field with both ignition and gazebo Vector3's. `PhysicsEngine::GetParam` can only return one value though (currently `gazebo::math::Vector3`).

Also, I noticed that `boost::any PhysicsEngine::GetParam(const std::string &)` wasn't implemented, so I made a quick implementation.
description.html:
I noticed that sdformat had a broken pragma when suppressing deprecation warnings (push instead of pop). Fixing that pragma (sdformat pull request 196) causes a bunch of gazebo warnings in the following files:

  • examples/plugins/model_move/model_move.cc
  • gazebo/physics/PhysicsEngine.cc
  • gazebo/physics/PresetManager.cc

This branch fixes those warnings.

Also, I noticed that some of the warnings were related to problems parsing Vector3 variables from sdf world files (#1631), so I fixed that as well. It involves handling ignition::math::Vector3d types in PresetManager and PhysicsEngine::SetParam. To be sure that it's working, I added tests for setting gravity and magnitic_field with both ignition and gazebo Vector3's. PhysicsEngine::GetParam can only return one value though (currently gazebo::math::Vector3).

Also, I noticed that boost::any PhysicsEngine::GetParam(const std::string &) wasn't implemented, so I made a quick implementation.

title.html: Fix #1631 and anticipated deprecation warnings

This branch fixes those warnings.
